name: Communication Book
description: My first experience with InDesign. The book's content was made by Nils Petter Johnsrud.

name: Manhunt Poster
description: A poster made for a student movie. The whole poster is designed in Photoshop.

name: Logo Design Manual
description: Design manual based on a student-made logo. Includes blending on clothes in InDesign.

name: Guess the Number
description: My last game, with stylized background, screen and terminal. Includes sarcasm.

name: How to Take Photos
description: A manual for how to take a good photo with your own phone. Designed in InDesign.

name: Class Quote Book
description: As a last thing for the class, I made a class quote book containing memorable sayings.
